wikipedia_page.main: Brian Martin (born 24 February 1963 in Bellshill) is a Scottish former footballer who played as a central defender, best known for his seven-year spell at Motherwell.

response: * Brian Martin (footballer, born 1963), Scottish footballer (Motherwell FC, national team)
* Brian Martin (social scientist) (born 1947), professor at the University of Wollongong in Australia
